params.encoded: The calldata which encoded by ABI Encoding.
params.gasLimit: Gas limit for destination user application used.
params.params: General extensibility for relayer to custom functionality.

importHash(uint256,address,uint256,bytes.details: Import hash by any oracle address.

recv((address,uint256,uint256,address,ui.details: Recv verified message from Channel and dispatch to destination user application address.

send(uint256,address,uint256,bytes,addre.details: Send a cross-chain message over the endpoint.

params.encoded: The calldata which encoded by ABI Encoding.
params.gasLimit: Gas limit for destination user application used.
params.params: General extensibility for relayer to custom functionality.
params.refund: Return extra fee to refund address.
params.to: User application contract address which receive the message.

setDefaultConfig(address,address).details: Set default user config for all user application.

getAppConfig(address).notice: If user application has not configured, then the default user config is used.

importHash(uint256,address,uint256,bytes.notice: Hash is an abstract of the proof system, it can be a block hash or a message root hash,  		specifically provided by oracles.

recv((address,uint256,uint256,address,ui.notice: Only channel could call this function.
